name: Forest defence
description:
This game was created for a TriJam with the theme Crappy Developers 

So I created this game to have fun elements that but it is unbalanced as a key limitation is missing making it possible to play the game and never lose. 

I'm also not going to tell you how to play because that is kind of the point :P 

Art assets and audio Assets are form asset packs from both unity and humble bundle :)
